personality.traits: I judge people by their actions, not their words. When I set my mind to something, I follow through no matter what gets in my way.
personality.ideals: Respect. People deserve to be treated with dignity and respect. Freedom. Tyrants must not be allowed to oppress the people.
personality.bonds: Ironjaw and I saved a village from a marauding orc warband. The bear has been my companion ever since.
personality.flaws: The tyrant who rules my land will stop at nothing to see me killed. I'm convinced of the significance of my destiny, and blind to my shortcomings.

character_appearance_description: A sturdy hill dwarf with weathered tan skin and keen amber eyes that constantly scan the treeline. His brown beard is thick and well-kept, often with bits of forest debris caught in it. He moves with the quiet confidence of someone who has spent years navigating wild places, and the faint smell of pine and bear musk follows him.
backstory:
Thorek was a simple woodsman living on the edge of the great forest, making his living as a carpenter and guide. One fateful autumn, an orc warband descended upon his village. During the attack, he discovered a wounded bear cub whose mother had been slain by the orcs. Together, they fought off the raiders. Thorek wielded his grandfather's warhammer while the young bear battled with surprising ferocity.

The village elder proclaimed them both heroes, and from that day forward, Thorek and the bear became inseparable companions. He named the bear Ironjaw for his powerful bite, and now they travel the land together as defenders of the common folk.

allies_organizations.name: The Village of Millhaven
allies_organizations.description: The village Thorek and Ironjaw saved from the orc warband. The villagers consider him a hero and will always offer shelter and aid. He also has connections with local woodcutters and the trappers guild.

additional_features_traits: STR 15, DEX 10, CON 14, INT 2, WIS 12, CHA 7
Ring bonus: +2 dmg, magical attacks, charm/fear adv.
treasure: Ring of the Wild Hunt (Rare, attuned)

weapons.name: Longbow
weapons.notes: +2 from Archery fighting style included in attack bonus

weapons.name: Warhammer
weapons.notes: Can be used one or two-handed

weapons.name: Handaxe
weapons.notes: Can throw or use in melee

spells.name: Hunter's Mark
spells.description: Mark a creature you can see. Deal extra 1d6 damage to it whenever you hit with a weapon attack. Advantage on Perception/Survival checks to find it. If target drops to 0 HP, use bonus action to mark new creature.

spells.name: Cure Wounds
spells.description: Creature you touch regains 1d8 + spellcasting modifier (WIS +2) hit points. No effect on undead or constructs.

spells.name: Goodberry
spells.description: Create 10 magical berries. Eating a berry (1 action) restores 1 HP and provides nourishment for one day. Berries lose potency after 24 hours.

features.name: Favored Enemy: Orcs & Goblins
features.description: Advantage on Survival checks to track and Intelligence checks to recall info about orcs and goblins. Learn one language spoken by them (Orc).

features.name: Natural Explorer: Forest
features.description: In forest terrain: difficult terrain doesn't slow group, can't get lost (except magic), alert to danger while doing other activities, move stealthily alone at normal pace, find twice as much food foraging, learn exact number/size of creatures tracked.

features.name: Fighting Style: Archery
features.description: +2 bonus to attack rolls with ranged weapons.

features.name: Primeval Awareness
features.description: Spend 1 spell slot. For 1 minute per spell level, sense whether aberrations, celestials, dragons, elementals, fey, fiends, or undead are within 1 mile (6 miles in favored terrain). Doesn't reveal location or number.

features.name: Dwarven Resilience
features.description: Advantage on saving throws against poison. Resistance to poison damage.

features.name: Stonecunning
features.description: When making Intelligence (History) check related to origin of stonework, add double proficiency bonus (+4 instead of +2).

features.name: Rustic Hospitality
features.description: You can find a place to hide, rest, or recuperate among commoners, unless you've shown yourself a danger. They will shield you from the law or anyone searching for you, though not at risk of their lives.

turn_structure.title: Your Turn

phases.name: Movement
phases.desc: Move up to your speed (can split before/after action)

phases.name: Action
phases.desc: Attack, Cast Spell, Dash, Disengage, Dodge, Help, Hide, Ready, Search, Use Object

phases.name: Bonus Action
phases.desc: If available (some spells, class features, two-weapon fighting)

phases.name: Free Interaction
phases.desc: Draw/sheathe weapon, open door, pick up item, speak briefly

turn_structure.reaction: Once per round, even on others' turns (opportunity attacks, some spells)

actions.name: Attack
actions.desc: Make one melee or ranged attack (or more with Extra Attack)

actions.name: Cast a Spell
actions.desc: Cast a spell with casting time of 1 action

actions.name: Dash
actions.desc: Gain extra movement equal to your speed

actions.name: Disengage
actions.desc: Your movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks

actions.name: Dodge
actions.desc: Attacks against you have disadvantage; DEX saves have advantage

actions.name: Help
actions.desc: Give ally advantage on next ability check or attack roll

actions.name: Ready
actions.desc: Prepare action for a trigger (uses reaction when triggered)

conditions_quick.name: Prone
conditions_quick.desc: Disadvantage on attacks; melee attacks against have advantage, ranged have disadvantage; stand costs half movement

conditions_quick.name: Grappled
conditions_quick.desc: Speed becomes 0; ends if grappler incapacitated or effect moves you out of reach

conditions_quick.name: Frightened
conditions_quick.desc: Disadvantage on ability checks and attacks while source of fear is in sight; can't move closer to source

conditions_quick.name: Stunned
conditions_quick.desc: Incapacitated, can't move, auto-fail STR/DEX saves, attacks against have advantage

companion.name: Ironjaw
companion.hp_notes: 19 base + 6 from Ring of the Wild Hunt

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: Advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Ring of the Wild Hunt
traits.description: +2 damage on attacks, +6 HP, attacks count as magical, advantage on saves vs charm and frighten effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Ironjaw makes two attacks: one bite and one claw.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6+4 piercing damage (includes +2 from ring).

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4+4 slashing damage (includes +2 from ring).

commands: Use action to command Ironjaw to take Attack, Dash, Disengage, Dodge, or Help action
If no command given, Ironjaw takes Dodge action
Can also use reaction to command Ironjaw when hit by attack
